AI.conclusion: NRFM为直接映射向列材料中弛豫时间提供了强大工具，可应用于任何具有电子向列性的材料，简化了电子热化时间的测量过程。

title: Microscopic origin of an exceptionally large phonon thermal Hall effect from charge puddles in a topological insulator
summary: We present the experimental observation of a drastically enhanced thermal Hall effect in the topological insulator material TlBi$_{0.15}$Sb$_{0.85}$Te$_2$. Although heat transport is dominated by phonons, moderate magnetic fields generate a thermal Hall ratio ($κ_{xy}/κ_{xx}$) above 2\%, an unprecedented value for a nonmagnetic material. The transverse thermal conductivity $κ_{xy}$ exhibits a pronounced maximum in fields of a few Tesla. This characteristic field dependence allows us to identify the microscopic origin of the thermal Hall effect in this system. Small densities of charged impurities induce locally conducting regions, so-called charge puddles, within the bulk insulating matrix. Via electron-phonon coupling, these charge puddles imprint a large thermal Hall effect onto the phonons accounting for both the magnitude and the magnetic-field dependence of the observed effect.

AI.tldr: 在拓扑绝缘体材料TlBi₀.₁₅Sb₀.₈₅Te₂中观察到显著增强的热霍尔效应，热霍尔比超过2%，这是非磁性材料中的前所未有的值。
AI.motivation: 研究拓扑绝缘体材料中的热输运现象，特别是探索非磁性材料中产生显著热霍尔效应的机制。
AI.method: 通过实验观察TlBi₀.₁₅Sb₀.₈₅Te₂材料在磁场下的热霍尔效应，测量横向热导率κxy随磁场的变化，分析其微观起源。
AI.result: 观察到热霍尔比(κxy/κxx)超过2%，这是非磁性材料中的最高值；横向热导率κxy在几特斯拉磁场下出现明显峰值；通过特征磁场依赖性确定了效应的微观机制。
AI.conclusion: 少量带电杂质诱导的电荷"puddles"通过电子-声子耦合，将大的热霍尔效应"印刻"到声子上，解释了观测效应的幅度和磁场依赖性。

title: Quasi-One-Dimensional Electronic Nature of Ta4SiTe4 Underlying the Giant Thermoelectric Performance
summary: Ta4SiTe4 is a one-dimensional van der Waals material that exhibits an exceptionally large thermoelectric power factor below room temperature. However, since this material has been available only in the form of acicular microcrystals, experimental exploration of the electronic properties responsible for its giant thermoelectric performance has long been challenging. In this study, we quantitatively evaluated the one-dimensional electronic nature of Ta4SiTe4 by combining micro-spot angle-resolved photoemission spectroscopy and transport measurements on focused-ion-beam-processed samples. The angle-resolved photoemission spectroscopy measurements reveal anisotropic band dispersions along and perpendicular to the crystallographic c axis. Consistently, transport measurements demonstrate that the resistivity perpendicular to the c axis is approximately five times larger than that along the c axis at 200 K. These results provide direct experimental evidence for the quasi-one-dimensional electronic character of Ta4SiTe4, which underlies its giant thermoelectric response reported previously, and offer fundamental insights into the role of electronic dimensionality in enhancing thermoelectric performance.

AI.tldr: Ta4SiTe4是一种一维范德华材料，具有巨大的热电功率因子。研究通过微区角分辨光电子能谱和聚焦离子束处理样品的输运测量，定量评估了其准一维电子特性。
AI.motivation: Ta4SiTe4在室温以下表现出异常大的热电功率因子，但由于该材料仅以针状微晶形式存在，对其巨大热电性能背后的电子性质进行实验探索一直具有挑战性。
AI.method: 结合微区角分辨光电子能谱和聚焦离子束处理样品的输运测量，定量评估Ta4SiTe4的一维电子特性。
AI.result: 角分辨光电子能谱显示沿晶体c轴和垂直方向的各向异性能带色散；输运测量表明在200K时垂直c轴的电阻率约为沿c轴方向的5倍，直接证明了Ta4SiTe4的准一维电子特性。
AI.conclusion: 研究为Ta4SiTe4的准一维电子特性提供了直接实验证据，这解释了其先前报道的巨大热电响应，并为电子维度在增强热电性能中的作用提供了基础见解。

title: A steady-state study of the nonequilibrium properties of realistic materials: Application of the mixed-configuration approximation
summary: We present the mixed-configuration approximation (MCA) based on the auxiliary master equation approach impurity solver to study multiorbital correlated systems under equilibrium and nonequilibrium conditions within dynamical mean-field theory (DMFT). We benchmark the method for bulk and layered SrVO$_3$ in equilibrium and apply it to a prototypical nonequilibrium geometry in which a voltage bias is applied perpendicular to the layer via reservoirs held at different chemical potentials. For bulk SrVO$_3$, MCA reproduces the metallic state at moderate interaction strengths, but it overestimates the weight of the lower band relative to quantum Monte Carlo (QMC) and fork tensor product state (FTPS) solvers. With respect to QMC and FTPS, MCA yields an earlier metal-to-insulator transition as the electron-electron interaction is increased. In layered SrVO$_3$ at equilibrium, MCA partially captures the orbital polarization in favor of the in-plane $xy$ orbital, although not as strong as in the DMFT-converged results obtained with QMC. However, when performing a one-shot impurity calculation initialized with the DFMT-QMC results, MCA yields orbital occupations which show a stronger charge polarization in favor of orbital $xy$. This suggests that our approach can be used to study multiorbital impurity problems when the focus is to assess properties without performing the full DMFT self-consistent loop. Finally, under applied bias, we observe a pronounced redistribution of orbital occupations, demonstrating that the method captures bias-driven orbital charge transfer in realistic materials in nonequilibrium conditions.

AI.tldr: 基于辅助主方程方法的混合构型近似用于研究多轨道关联系统的平衡和非平衡性质，在SrVO₃材料中验证了方法有效性，展示了偏压驱动的轨道电荷转移。
AI.motivation: 开发一种能够处理多轨道关联系统在平衡和非平衡条件下的计算方法，特别是在动态平均场理论框架下，解决传统量子蒙特卡洛方法计算成本高的问题。
AI.method: 提出混合构型近似方法，基于辅助主方程杂质求解器，在动态平均场理论框架下研究多轨道关联系统。方法应用于体相和层状SrVO₃材料，包括平衡态和非平衡态（施加垂直层方向的电压偏压）。
AI.result: 对于体相SrVO₃，MCA在中等相互作用强度下再现金属态，但高估了下带权重；金属-绝缘体转变比QMC和FTPS更早发生。对于层状SrVO₃，MCA部分捕获了xy轨道的轨道极化，但不如DMFT-QMC结果强。在非平衡条件下，方法观察到明显的轨道占据重新分布，表明能够捕获偏压驱动的轨道电荷转移。
AI.conclusion: 混合构型近似方法为研究多轨道杂质问题提供了一种有效工具，特别适用于评估性质而无需执行完整的DMFT自洽循环，能够处理平衡和非平衡条件下的轨道电荷转移现象。

title: CatFlow: Co-generation of Slab-Adsorbate Systems via Flow Matching
summary: Discovering heterogeneous catalysts tailored for specific reaction intermediates remains a fundamental bottleneck in materials science. While traditional trial-and-error methods and recent generative models have shown promise, they struggle to capture the intrinsic coupling between surface geometry and adsorbate interactions. To address this limitation, we propose CatFlow, a flow matching-based framework for de novo design and structure prediction of heterogeneous catalysts. Our model operates on a primitive cell-based factorized representation of the slab-adsorbate complex, reducing the number of learnable variables by an average of 9.2x while explicitly encoding the surface orientation of the slab-adsorbate interface. Experiments on the Open Catalyst 2020 dataset demonstrate that CatFlow significantly improves the structural fidelity of generated catalysts compared to autoregressive and sequential baselines. Further experiments show that the generated structures accurately capture the adsorption energy distributions of physically plausible interfaces and lie closer to thermodynamic local minima.

AI.tldr: CatFlow：基于流匹配的异相催化剂从头设计与结构预测框架，通过因子化表示显著减少学习变量，提升生成催化剂的结构保真度
AI.motivation: 传统试错法和现有生成模型难以捕捉表面几何结构与吸附物相互作用的内在耦合关系，这是异相催化剂设计中的根本瓶颈
AI.method: 提出CatFlow框架，基于流匹配技术，采用原胞因子化表示法描述板-吸附物复合体，将学习变量平均减少9.2倍，并显式编码表面取向
AI.result: 在Open Catalyst 2020数据集上，CatFlow相比自回归和序列基线显著提升生成催化剂的结构保真度，生成结构能准确捕捉吸附能分布并更接近热力学局部极小值
AI.conclusion: CatFlow通过创新的因子化表示和流匹配方法，有效解决了异相催化剂设计中表面几何与吸附物相互作用的耦合问题，为催化剂设计提供了新途径

title: Suppressed coarsening after an interaction quench in the Holstein chain
summary: We investigate the nonequilibrium dynamics induced by an interaction quench in the semiclassical Holstein model within the Ehrenfest nonadiabatic framework, which describes an isolated hybrid quantum-classical system with strictly conserved total energy. Focusing on the half-filled case, where the equilibrium ground state exhibits commensurate charge-density-wave (CDW) order for any nonzero coupling, we identify three distinct post-quench dynamical regimes as a function of the final electron-phonon coupling: a nonequilibrium metallic state without CDW order, an intermediate regime characterized by slow scale-invariant ordering dynamics, and a frozen CDW state with arrested coarsening and immobile kinks. We analyze the intermediate regime in detail and uncover an unconventional algebraic decay of the kink density, $n \sim t^{-1/3}$, distinct from both ballistic annihilation and diffusive coarsening in classical dissipative systems. We show that this anomalous exponent arises from the hybrid nature of the dynamics: while the lattice evolves deterministically, the electronic degrees of freedom act as an effective internal bath that induces diffusive kink motion without energy dissipation. An effective reaction-diffusion description, incorporating both annihilation and elastic scattering of kinks, quantitatively accounts for the observed scaling behavior. Our results reveal a distinct coarsening mechanism in isolated hybrid systems, demonstrating how internal quantum dynamics can qualitatively reshape defect kinetics far from equilibrium.

AI.tldr: 研究半经典Holstein模型中相互作用淬火诱导的非平衡动力学，发现三种不同的淬火后动力学区域，其中中间区域表现出异常的代数衰减n∼t^{-1/3}，源于电子自由度作为有效内部浴池诱导的无能量耗散的扩散运动。
AI.motivation: 研究孤立混合量子-经典系统中相互作用淬火后的非平衡动力学，特别关注电荷密度波序的动力学和缺陷运动，探索内部量子动力学如何影响远离平衡态的缺陷动力学。
AI.method: 使用Ehrenfest非绝热框架研究半经典Holstein模型，聚焦于半填充情况，分析电子-声子耦合淬火后的动力学，通过有效反应-扩散描述结合湮灭和弹性散射来解释观察到的标度行为。
AI.result: 识别出三种不同的淬火后动力学区域：无CDW序的非平衡金属态、具有慢标度不变有序动力学的中间区域、以及具有冻结CDW态和固定扭结的冻结区域。中间区域表现出异常的扭结密度代数衰减n∼t^{-1/3}，不同于经典耗散系统中的弹道湮灭或扩散粗化。
AI.conclusion: 揭示了孤立混合系统中独特的粗化机制，展示了内部量子动力学如何从根本上重塑远离平衡态的缺陷动力学，为理解混合量子-经典系统中的非平衡现象提供了新视角。

title: Ferroelectricity in Atomically Thin Metallic TaNiTe$_5$ with Ultrahigh Carrier Density
summary: Ferroelectric metals, characterized by the coexistence of ferroelectricity and metallic conductivity, present a fundamental challenge due to the screening effect of free charge carriers on the long-range electric dipole order. Existing strategies to circumvent this obstacle include employing two-dimensional (2D) crystals, where reduced dimensionality and low carrier densities suppress screening, or designing materials of van der Waals (vdW) superlattice with spatially separated and decoupled conductive and nearly insulating ferroelectric layers. Here, we report an alternative paradigm in TaNiTe5, where an ultrahigh carrier density coexists with an out-of-plane ferroelectric order within the same surface monolayer. Using piezoresponse force microscopy (PFM), we observed robust ferroelectric behavior in TaNiTe5 down to single-unit-cell thickness (~1.3 nm) at room temperature. Scanning transmission electron microscopy (STEM) gives structural evidence that the ferroelectricity might originate from the vertical displacement of outmost Te atoms on the surface, breaking the inversion symmetry. Concurrently, electrical transport measurements reveal a metallic state with a carrier density on the order of 10$^{15}$ cm$^{-2}$ (or 10$^{22}$ cm$^{-3}$) -- comparable to that of Copper (Cu). Our findings establish a unique platform for exploring the interplay between ferroelectricity and an ultrahigh density of mobile carriers in the 2D limit.

AI.tldr: 在TaNiTe5中发现了一种新型二维铁电金属，其中超高载流子密度与面外铁电性共存于同一表面单层中，突破了传统铁电金属中自由载流子屏蔽铁电极化的限制。
AI.motivation: 传统铁电金属面临自由载流子对长程电偶极序的屏蔽效应挑战。现有策略包括使用二维晶体（降低维度抑制屏蔽）或设计范德华超晶格（分离导电层和铁电层）。本文探索在单一表面层中同时实现铁电性和金属导电性的新范式。
AI.method: 使用压电力显微镜（PFM）观察TaNiTe5的铁电行为，扫描透射电子显微镜（STEM）分析结构起源，电输运测量表征金属态和载流子密度。
AI.result: 在TaNiTe5中观察到室温下直至单晶胞厚度（~1.3 nm）的稳健铁电行为。结构分析表明铁电性可能源于表面最外层Te原子的垂直位移，打破了反演对称性。同时电输运测量显示金属态，载流子密度达10¹⁵ cm⁻²（或10²² cm⁻³），与铜相当。
AI.conclusion: TaNiTe5为在二维极限下探索铁电性与超高密度移动载流子之间的相互作用提供了一个独特平台，突破了传统铁电金属的设计限制。

title: Topological piezomagnetic effect in two-dimensional Dirac quadrupole altermagnets
summary: Altermagnets provide a natural platform for studying and exploiting piezomagnetism. In this paper, we introduce a class of insulating altermagnets in two dimensions (2D) referred to as Dirac quadrupole altermagnets, and show based on microscopic minimal models that the orbital piezomagnetic polarizability of such altermagnets has a topological contribution described by topological response theory. The essential low-energy electronic structure of Dirac quadrupole altermagnets can be understood from a gapless parent phase (i.e., the Dirac quadrupole semimetal), which has important implications for their response to external fields. Focusing on the strain-induced response, here we demonstrate that the topological piezomagnetic effect is a consequence of the way in which strain affects the Dirac points forming a quadrupole. We consider two microscopic models: a spinless two-band model describing a band inversion of $s$ and $d$ states, and a Lieb lattice model with collinear Néel order. The latter is a prototypical minimal model for altermagnetism in 2D and is realized in a number of recently proposed material compounds, which are discussed.

AI.tldr: 二维狄拉克四极反铁磁体具有拓扑压磁效应，应变通过影响狄拉克点产生拓扑响应
AI.motivation: 反铁磁体是研究压磁效应的天然平台，本文旨在探索二维绝缘反铁磁体中的拓扑压磁响应
AI.method: 提出狄拉克四极反铁磁体概念，基于微观最小模型分析，包括自旋无关的双带模型（s和d态能带反转）和具有共线尼尔序的Lieb晶格模型
AI.result: 发现轨道压磁极化率包含拓扑贡献，拓扑压磁效应源于应变对形成四极的狄拉克点的影响
AI.conclusion: 狄拉克四极反铁磁体展现出拓扑压磁效应，这种效应源于其无间隙母相（狄拉克四极半金属）的电子结构特性

title: AMDAT: An Open-Source Molecular Dynamics Analysis Toolkit for Supercooled Liquids, Glass-Forming Materials, and Complex Fluids
summary: AMDAT (Amorphous Molecular Dynamics Analysis Toolkit) is an open-source C++ toolkit for post-processing molecular dynamics trajectories, focused on high-performance static and dynamic analyses of amorphous, glassy, and polymer materials, including supercooled liquids and complex fluids. In this paper, we describe AMDAT's design for efficient long-timescale analysis via in-memory trajectory handling and exponential time sampling, and we demonstrate representative workflows for widely used observables such as radial distribution functions, structure factors, intermediate scattering functions, and neighbor correlations.

AI.tldr: AMDAT是一个用于分子动力学轨迹后处理的开源C++工具包，专注于非晶、玻璃态和聚合物材料的高性能静态和动态分析。
AI.motivation: 需要高效处理分子动力学轨迹，特别是针对非晶、玻璃态、聚合物材料、过冷液体和复杂流体等材料的长时标分析。
AI.method: 采用内存内轨迹处理和指数时间采样设计，实现高效的长时标分析，支持径向分布函数、结构因子、中间散射函数和邻居相关等常用观测量的工作流程。
AI.result: 开发了AMDAT工具包，能够高效处理分子动力学轨迹，支持多种常用观测量的分析工作流程。
AI.conclusion: AMDAT为分析非晶、玻璃态和聚合物材料的分子动力学模拟提供了高性能、开源的工具包，特别适合长时标分析需求。

title: Crystallinity Evolution of MOCVD-Grown $β$-Ga$_2$O$_3$ Films Probed by In Situ HT-XRD under Different Reactor Heights
summary: The crystallinity of $β$-Ga$_2$O$_3$ thin films grown by metal-organic chemical vapor deposition (MOCVD) is strongly influenced by reactor design and the resulting growth environment. In this work, we investigate the role of reactor height on the crystallinity evolution of MOCVD-grown $β$-Ga$_2$O$_3$ films by directly comparing long- and short-chamber showerhead configurations. Structural evolution was probed by in situ high-temperature X-ray diffraction (HT-XRD) as the MOCVD-grown films were heated from 25~$^\circ$C to 1100~$^\circ$C. Temperature-dependent XRD reveals a consistent redshift of the $β$-Ga$_2$O$_3$~($-201$) reflection after HT-XRD heating and subsequent cooling to room temperature for both reactor geometries, indicating a similar thermally driven strain response. Quantitative rocking-curve analysis shows a non-monotonic temperature dependence of the ($-201$) full width at half maximum (FWHM), with minimum values of approximately 2.03$^\circ$ and 2.72$^\circ$ for the short- and long-chamber films, respectively, reflecting differences in mosaic alignment established during growth. Atomic force microscopy further shows that short-chamber-grown films exhibit smoother surfaces, with root-mean-square roughness values of approximately 7.7~nm before and 7.3~nm after HT-XRD heating, compared to 19.3~nm and 12.3~nm, respectively, for long-chamber-grown films. Overall, these results indicate that reactor height influences the initial crystalline and morphological templates of $β$-Ga$_2$O$_3$ films and modulates their elevated-temperature structural response, providing practical insights for optimizing MOCVD reactor design for high-quality $β$-Ga$_2$O$_3$ growth.

AI.tldr: 研究MOCVD反应器高度对β-Ga₂O₃薄膜结晶度的影响，通过比较长短腔室配置，发现短腔室生长的薄膜具有更好的晶体质量和更光滑的表面。
AI.motivation: β-Ga₂O₃薄膜的结晶度受MOCVD反应器设计和生长环境的影响，但反应器高度对晶体质量的具体影响机制尚不清楚，需要系统研究以优化反应器设计。
AI.method: 使用长短两种腔室配置的MOCVD生长β-Ga₂O₃薄膜，通过原位高温X射线衍射(HT-XRD)在25-1100°C范围内监测结构演变，结合摇摆曲线分析和原子力显微镜表征表面形貌。
AI.result: 短腔室生长的薄膜(-201)反射半高宽更小(2.03° vs 2.72°)，表面更光滑(RMS粗糙度7.7nm vs 19.3nm)，且高温处理后表面粗糙度改善更明显。两种反应器都观察到相似的热致应变响应。
AI.conclusion: 反应器高度影响β-Ga₂O₃薄膜的初始晶体和形态模板，并调节其高温结构响应，短腔室配置能获得更高质量的薄膜，为优化MOCVD反应器设计提供了实用指导。

title: Giant bubbles of Fisher zeros in the quantum XY chain
summary: We demonstrate an alternative approach based on complex-valued inverse temperature and partition function to probe quantum phases of matter with nontrivial spectra and dynamics. It leverages thermofield dynamics (TFD) to quantitatively characterize quantum and thermal fluctuations, and exploit the correspondence between low-energy excitations and Fisher zeros. Using the quantum XY chain in an external field as a testbed, we show that the oscillatory gap behavior manifests as oscillations in the long-time dynamics of the TFD spectral form factor. We also identify giant bubbles, i.e. large-scale closed lines, of Fisher-zeros near the gapless XX limit. They provide a characteristic energy scale that seems to contradict the predictions of the low energy theory of a featureless Luttinger liquid. We identify this energy scale and relate the motion of these giant bubbles with varying external field to the transfer of spectral weight from high to low energies. The deep connection between Fisher zeros, dynamics, and excitations opens up promising avenues for understanding the unconventional gap behaviors in strongly correlated many-body systems.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出基于复值逆温度和配分函数的新方法，通过热场动力学和Fisher零点研究量子相变、能谱结构和动力学行为，在XY链模型中发现了振荡能隙行为和Fisher零点巨型气泡等新现象。
AI.motivation: 传统方法难以探测具有非平凡能谱和动力学的量子物相，需要发展新方法来定量表征量子涨落和热涨落，并揭示低能激发与Fisher零点之间的对应关系。
AI.method: 采用基于复值逆温度和配分函数的方法，结合热场动力学定量表征量子涨落和热涨落，利用Fisher零点与低能激发的对应关系，以量子XY链在外部场中作为测试平台。
AI.result: 在XY链中发现振荡能隙行为表现为热场动力学谱形式因子的长时间动力学振荡；在无隙XX极限附近识别出Fisher零点巨型气泡（大规模闭合线），这些气泡提供了与无特征Luttinger液体低能理论预测相矛盾的特征能量尺度。
AI.conclusion: Fisher零点、动力学和激发之间的深刻联系为理解强关联多体系统中的非常规能隙行为开辟了有前景的研究途径，揭示了谱权重从高能向低能转移的机制。

title: Observation of large perpendicular magnetic anisotropy and excessive polar magneto-optical effect in Pt/CoFeB/Ru tri-layer system
summary: Heterostructures comprising ferromagnet (FM) and heavy metals (HM) with perpendicular magnetic anisotropy (PMA) and interfacial Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interaction (iDMI) can host chiral domain walls and topological spin textures, making them highly promising for various spintronics applications. In this paper, we have investigated the magneto-optical properties, the anomalous Hall effect (AHE), and PMA of Pt/CoFeB/Ru multilayers engineered to possess significant iDMI. We utilized the Anomalous Hall effect (AHE), and the polar magneto-optical Kerr effect (p-MOKE), Hall response and the domain wall motion in Pt/CoFeB/Ru-systems. Both MOKE and AHE measurements confirm that the films maintain strong perpendicular magnetization for CoFeB thicknesses below 1.2 nm. The effective magnetic anisotropy K_{\mathrm{eff}} of 0.88 \times 10^6 erg/cm^3 has been achieved without any post-annealing, highlighting the high-quality interface in this multilayer design. The angular dependence of the switching field deviates from the conventional Kondorsky model and is well described using a modified Kondorsky formalism, capturing the role of field-induced domain-wall softening and pinning effects in the reversal process. Furthermore, p-MOKE microscopy imaging during the magnetization reversal process provides detailed insight into domain nucleation and subsequent domain-wall propagation. The observations reveal well-defined, stable magnetic domains that evolve coherently under the applied magnetic field. Such a behavior is expected in the system where interfacial DMI, PMA interact to stabilize the chiral Néel-type domain walls, which are essential for fast, low-power domain-wall motion driven by spin-orbit torques.

AI.tldr: 研究了Pt/CoFeB/Ru多层膜中界面DMI和垂直磁各向异性的磁光特性、反常霍尔效应和磁畴动力学
AI.motivation: 具有垂直磁各向异性和界面DMI的FM/HM异质结构可以承载手性磁畴壁和拓扑自旋结构，在自旋电子学应用中具有重要前景
AI.method: 使用反常霍尔效应、极向磁光克尔效应、霍尔响应和磁畴壁运动测量，研究Pt/CoFeB/Ru多层膜的磁光特性、反常霍尔效应和垂直磁各向异性
AI.result: 薄膜在CoFeB厚度低于1.2nm时保持强垂直磁化，获得0.88×10^6 erg/cm³的有效磁各向异性；开关场角度依赖偏离传统Kondorsky模型，磁畴反转过程显示明确的稳定磁畴
AI.conclusion: 界面DMI和PMA相互作用稳定了手性Néel型磁畴壁，这对于自旋轨道力矩驱动的快速、低功耗磁畴壁运动至关重要

title: Reducing the Computational Cost Scaling of Tensor Network Algorithms via Field-Programmable Gate Array Parallelism
summary: Improving the computational efficiency of quantum many-body calculations from a hardware perspective remains a critical challenge. Although field-programmable gate arrays (FPGAs) have recently been exploited to improve the computational scaling of algorithms such as Monte Carlo methods, their application to tensor network algorithms is still at an early stage. In this work, we propose a fine-grained parallel tensor network design based on FPGAs to substantially enhance the computational efficiency of two representative tensor network algorithms: the infinite time-evolving block decimation (iTEBD) and the higher-order tensor renormalization group (HOTRG). By employing a quad-tile partitioning strategy to decompose tensor elements and map them onto hardware circuits, our approach effectively translates algorithmic computational complexity into scalable hardware resource utilization, enabling an extremely high degree of parallelism on FPGAs. Compared with conventional CPU-based implementations, our scheme exhibits superior scalability in computation time, reducing the bond-dimension scaling of the computational cost from $O(D_b^3)$ to $O(D_b)$ for iTEBD and from $O(D_b^6)$ to $O(D_b^2)$ for HOTRG. This work provides a theoretical foundation for future hardware implementations of large-scale tensor network computations.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于FPGA的细粒度并行张量网络设计，显著提升了iTEBD和HOTRG两种代表性张量网络算法的计算效率，将计算复杂度从O(D_b^3)降低到O(D_b)和从O(D_b^6)降低到O(D_b^2)。
AI.motivation: 从硬件角度提升量子多体计算的计算效率是一个关键挑战。虽然FPGA已被用于改进蒙特卡洛等算法的计算扩展性，但在张量网络算法中的应用仍处于早期阶段。
AI.method: 提出基于FPGA的细粒度并行张量网络设计，采用四瓦片分区策略分解张量元素并将其映射到硬件电路，将算法计算复杂度转化为可扩展的硬件资源利用，实现FPGA上的极高并行度。
AI.result: 相比传统CPU实现，该方案在计算时间上表现出优越的可扩展性：iTEBD的计算成本键维数缩放从O(D_b^3)降低到O(D_b)，HOTRG从O(D_b^6)降低到O(D_b^2)。
AI.conclusion: 这项工作为未来大规模张量网络计算的硬件实现提供了理论基础。

title: Broken neural scaling laws in materials science
summary: In materials science, data are scarce and expensive to generate, whether computationally or experimentally. Therefore, it is crucial to identify how model performance scales with dataset size and model capacity to distinguish between data- and model-limited regimes. Neural scaling laws provide a framework for quantifying this behavior and guide the design of materials datasets and machine learning architectures. Here, we investigate neural scaling laws for a paradigmatic materials science task: predicting the dielectric function of metals, a high-dimensional response that governs how solids interact with light. Using over 200,000 dielectric functions from high-throughput ab initio calculations, we study two multi-objective graph neural networks trained to predict the frequency-dependent complex interband dielectric function and the Drude frequency. We observe broken neural scaling laws with respect to dataset size, whereas scaling with the number of model parameters follows a simple power law that rapidly saturates.

AI.tldr: 该研究探讨了材料科学中神经网络缩放定律，发现对于金属介电函数预测任务，数据集大小的缩放定律存在断裂，而模型参数数量的缩放遵循简单幂律但快速饱和。
AI.motivation: 材料科学中数据稀缺且生成成本高，需要理解模型性能如何随数据集大小和模型容量变化，以区分数据限制和模型限制的机制。神经网络缩放定律为此提供了量化框架，可指导材料数据集和机器学习架构的设计。
AI.method: 使用超过20万条高通量从头算计算的介电函数数据，研究两个多目标图神经网络，分别预测频率相关的复介电函数和Drude频率，分析其在不同数据集大小和模型参数数量下的性能缩放行为。
AI.result: 观察到相对于数据集大小的神经网络缩放定律存在断裂现象，而相对于模型参数数量的缩放遵循简单幂律但快速达到饱和。这表明对于该材料科学任务，数据质量和多样性可能比单纯增加数据量更重要。
AI.conclusion: 神经网络缩放定律在材料科学中表现出复杂行为，数据集大小的缩放存在断裂，而模型参数缩放快速饱和。这些发现强调了在材料机器学习中需要更细致地考虑数据质量和模型架构设计，而非简单地扩大数据集或增加模型容量。

title: Platform and Framework for Time-Resolved Nanoscale Thermal Transport Measurements in STEM
summary: Understanding heat transport at the nanometer scale is critical for semiconductor devices, quantum materials, and thermal management of nanostructures, yet direct local measurements of thermal conductivity and heat capacity remain scarce. We developed a laser-excitation system integrated into a scanning transmission electron microscope (STEM) for nanoscale thermal transport measurements using ultra-high-resolution electron energy-loss spectroscopy (EELS). A fiber-coupled laser is introduced via a modified aperture mechanism, enabling flexible holder geometries and large tilt angles without optical elements in the polepiece gap. Synchronization of pulsed laser excitation with an externally gated direct electron detector provides temporal resolution about 50 ns at <10 meV energy resolution. Local temperatures are determined via the principle of detailed balance, and thermal transport parameters are extracted by fitting a forward-time central-space heat diffusion model including radiative losses. For amorphous carbon films, we obtain a thermal conductivity of 1.24 $\frac{W}{m\cdot K}$ and a heat capacity of 821 $\frac{J}{kg\cdot K}$, consistent with literature. This framework enables time-resolved nanoscale measurements of thermal transport in materials and devices.

AI.tldr: 开发了集成激光激发系统的扫描透射电子显微镜，用于纳米尺度热输运测量，实现了约50ns时间分辨率和<10meV能量分辨率，成功测量了非晶碳膜的热导率和热容。
AI.motivation: 纳米尺度热输运测量对半导体器件、量子材料和纳米结构热管理至关重要，但目前直接局部测量热导率和热容的方法仍然稀缺。
AI.method: 开发了集成光纤耦合激光的STEM系统，通过改进的光阑机制引入激光，实现灵活样品台几何和大倾角。采用脉冲激光激发与外部门控直接电子探测器同步，获得约50ns时间分辨率。通过详细平衡原理确定局部温度，并拟合包含辐射损失的前向时间中心空间热扩散模型提取热输运参数。
AI.result: 对于非晶碳膜，测得热导率为1.24 W/(m·K)，热容为821 J/(kg·K)，与文献一致。该框架实现了材料和器件中热输运的时间分辨纳米尺度测量。
AI.conclusion: 开发了一种集成激光激发系统的STEM-EELS方法，实现了纳米尺度热输运参数的高时空分辨率测量，为材料和器件热管理研究提供了新工具。

title: Spontaneous Parity Breaking in Quantum Antiferromagnets on the Triangular Lattice
summary: Frustration on the triangular lattice has long been a source of intriguing and often debated phases in many-body systems. Although symmetry analysis has been employed, the role of the seemingly trivial parity symmetry has received little attention. In this work, we show that phases induced by frustration are systematically shaped by an implicit rule of thumb associated with spontaneous parity breaking. This principle enables us to anticipate and rationalize the regimes and conditions under which nontrivial phases emerge. For the spin-$S$ antiferromagnetic XXZ model, we demonstrate that a controversial parity-broken phase appears only at intermediate values of $S$. In bilayer systems, enhanced frustration leads to additional phases, such as supersolids, whose properties can be classified by their characteristic parity features. Benefiting from our improved tensor network contraction techniques, we confirm these results through large-scale tensor-network calculations. This study offers an alternative viewpoint and a systematic approach for examining the interplay between spin, symmetry, and frustration in many-body systems.

AI.tldr: 三角晶格上的阻挫通过自发宇称破缺塑造非平凡相，在自旋S XXZ模型中宇称破缺相仅出现在中等S值，双层系统中阻挫增强导致超固态等新相。
AI.motivation: 三角晶格阻挫系统长期以来存在许多有趣且有争议的相，虽然已有对称性分析，但看似平凡的宇称对称性的作用很少被关注。本研究旨在揭示宇称对称性在塑造阻挫诱导相中的系统性作用。
AI.method: 提出与自发宇称破缺相关的经验法则，用于预测和解释非平凡相的出现条件。通过改进的张量网络收缩技术，进行大规模张量网络计算验证结果。
AI.result: 对于自旋S反铁磁XXZ模型，发现争议性的宇称破缺相仅出现在中等S值。在双层系统中，增强的阻挫导致超固态等额外相，这些相的性质可以通过其特征宇称特性进行分类。
AI.conclusion: 本研究为考察多体系统中自旋、对称性和阻挫之间的相互作用提供了新的视角和系统方法，揭示了宇称对称性在塑造阻挫诱导相中的关键作用。

title: Questionable van der Waals Epitaxy of Non-Layered Materials on Fluorophlogopite Mica: The Case of ScN
summary: Growing stress-free epitaxial films by van der Waals epitaxy (vdWE) is of interest for realizing flexible optoelectronics and energy conversion devices from freestanding materials released from substrates that template epitaxy. Often, vdWE is presumed on substrates with layers held together by vdW bonding, e.g., mica, without sufficient theoretical basis or experimental evidence. Here, in case of NaCl metal nitrides, we demonstrate the thin film growth of single-domain ScN(111) by conventional epitaxy on fluorophlogopite mica(001) by sputter deposition. X-ray diffraction and electron microscopy reveal that the film/substrate epitaxial relationship is specified by [-101](111)ScN||[010](001)mica. The strong dependence of the (111) interplanar spacings with film thickness crystals indicates compressive stress buildup, which rules out the possibility of vdWE. These results are contrary to, and refute, prior claims of vdWE of non-layered metal nitrides on mica. Our findings suggest that conventional epitaxy should be the default assumption for non-layered materials unless conditions for vdWE are explicitly established.

AI.tldr: 该研究证明ScN(111)在云母上的生长是传统外延而非范德华外延，反驳了先前关于非层状金属氮化物在云母上范德华外延的假设。
AI.motivation: 澄清非层状材料在云母等基板上生长的机制，纠正先前关于范德华外延的错误假设，为薄膜生长机制提供准确理解。
AI.method: 采用溅射沉积在氟金云母(001)上生长ScN(111)薄膜，通过X射线衍射和电子显微镜分析薄膜/基板外延关系，测量(111)晶面间距随厚度的变化。
AI.result: 发现薄膜/基板外延关系为[-101](111)ScN||[010](001)mica，晶面间距随厚度变化显示压缩应力积累，证明是传统外延而非范德华外延。
AI.conclusion: 对于非层状材料在云母上的生长，应默认假设为传统外延，除非明确建立了范德华外延的条件，这纠正了先前研究中的错误假设。

title: Low-temperature spin dynamics in LAFO thin films: from cubic anisotropy to TLS-limited coherence
summary: We investigate the low-temperature spin dynamics of epitaxial lithium aluminum ferrite (LAFO) thin films using broadband ferromagnetic resonance (FMR) spectroscopy from 0.44 K to 68 K. The results reveal a crossover from conventional cubic anisotropy-dominated behavior at higher temperatures to pronounced linewidth broadening and higher-order anisotropy contributions at cryogenic temperatures. With the magnetic field oriented along the [100] crystallographic direction, the resonance is well-captured by four-fold in-plane and out-of-plane uniaxial anisotropies. In contrast, measurements with the field along the [110] direction reveal the presence of an unusually large sixth-order cubic anisotropy term that is symmetry-suppressed for [100] but becomes apparent under this field orientation at ultralow temperatures, indicating a substantial modification of the anisotropy landscape. Independent linewidth analysis shows a pronounced peak near 8 K and a subtle monotonic enhancement with decreasing temperatures below 2 K, features consistent with dissipation mediated by a bath of two-level systems (TLS) arising from antisite defects and localized Fe$^{3+}$ moments. Comparison with TLS-based models demonstrates that both exchange-coupled impurities and nearly free paramagnetic centers contribute to the observed damping. Our results establish LAFO as a model ferrite system where disorder-induced TLS limit spin coherence at ultralow temperatures, providing new insights into anisotropy engineering, magnetic relaxation, and the design of ferrimagnetic insulators for coherent magnonics. These findings offer a framework for future optimization of growth conditions.

AI.tldr: 研究使用宽带铁磁共振光谱在0.44-68K温度范围内研究锂铝铁氧体薄膜的自旋动力学，发现低温下存在高阶各向异性和由双能级系统介导的耗散机制。
AI.motivation: 研究锂铝铁氧体薄膜在超低温下的自旋动力学，探索其各向异性特性和磁弛豫机制，为相干磁子学应用提供基础理解。
AI.method: 使用宽带铁磁共振光谱在0.44K到68K温度范围内测量，分析不同磁场方向（[100]和[110]晶向）下的共振特性，并进行线宽分析。
AI.result: 发现从高温立方各向异性主导到低温高阶各向异性贡献的转变，在[110]方向观察到异常大的六阶立方各向异性项，线宽分析显示8K附近存在峰值和低于2K的单调增强，与双能级系统介导的耗散一致。
AI.conclusion: 锂铝铁氧体是研究无序诱导双能级系统限制自旋相干性的模型系统，为各向异性工程、磁弛豫和相干磁子学铁磁绝缘体设计提供了新见解，并为优化生长条件提供了框架。
